document_data.name: ''Mirror of Enlightenment''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mirrors of enlightenment''''' were a variety of [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[mirror]] from the land of [[Kara-Tur]] that allowed one to discern the inner nature of other creatures.
document_data.Description: These mirrors were round in shape and had a rather ordinary appearance.
document_data.Powers:
Whenever the [[command word]] of a ''mirror of enlightenment'' was spoken, the reflection of a creature in front of it would become surrounded by a colored aura. This aura was only visible to the one who spoke the command word and it revealed the nature of the reflected creature. This effect was similar to the [[spell]]s ''[[detect evil]]'', ''[[detect good]]'', ''[[detect motivation]]'', and ''[[know alignment]]''.

Only one creature could be reflected and studied within the mirror per minute.
